tag_list: internet-marketing, internet-marketing-company, seo, ppc, social-media, web-design
overview: Brandon Fishman is the CEO and Co-Founder of Internet Marketing Inc. Brandon is an entrepreneur and has started several companies. Brandon received his degree in Finance from Emory University and his Masters from the University of San Diego. Brandon is always looking to learn from internet marketing experts and test out new technologies in the industry. www.internetmarketinginc.com is one of the nation’s largest internet marketing agencies and the agency handles SEO, PPC, Web Design, Social Media, and Analytics.
